thread.title: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel 2 thoroughbred cards
thread.title_full: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel 2 thoroughbred cards

title: Rain forces Meadowlands to cancel 2 thoroughbred cards
text:
Meadowlands calls off Friday, Saturday thoroughbred cards because of rain THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   11:03 amLast   11:03 am   
Subjects: 
New Jersey (545) 

EAST RUTHERFORD, New Jersey — The Meadowlands Racetrack has canceled its thoroughbred racing cards for Friday and Saturday because of rain. 
The track said Friday it made the moves because of overnight rain and the forecast for more bad weather. All the races were to have been on grass. 
The meet runs through Oct. 31, with live racing Thursday through Saturday next week.
